attributes.action: P.M May must resign - Replace her and immediately afterwards call a snapelection
attributes.additional_details:
''The government's new white paper, setting out its vision for the post-Brexit end state, reveals plans to keep the UK under EU law during the transition period, without having any EU representation. ''

 -- http://www.cityam.com/289669/dominic-raab-unveils-brexit-end-state-white-paper-and

-- https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2018/jul/12/brexit-white-paper-wont-win-over-mps-or-the-eu

-- https://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/entry/theresa-may-resign-ben-bradley_uk_5b44d927e4b07aea7544af73
attributes.background:
PrimeMinister Theresa may must resign she has betrayed 17 million people and she will deliver a fake brexit.I have no confidence in her
She is making a fool out of herself and making our country laughable.
Replace her with someone else and call an election

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition, as the issue you raise isn't the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. The resignation of an MP, including the Prime Minister, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/221912
